aldarian-gauntlet.name: Aldarian Gauntlet
aldarian-gauntlet.description: A rare artifact. This battle-worn gauntlet shows heavy use.

aldarian-sword.name: Aldarian Sword
aldarian-sword.description: An uncommon artifact. A worn military sword, likely from the War of the Lilies.

aldarian-war-banner.name: Aldarian War Banner
aldarian-war-banner.description: A rare artifact. Emblazoned with the royal crest of Aldaria.

family-crest-pendant.name: Family Crest Pendant
family-crest-pendant.description: An uncommon artifact. Once widely adopted in Aldaria, pendants were given to family members who were leaving home for the first time.

lost-crown-of-aldaria.name: Lost Crown of Aldaria
lost-crown-of-aldaria.description: A legendary artifact. Could this be the crown that was lost after the Caldosian Empire's invasion?

caldosian-breastplate.name: Caldosian Breastplate
caldosian-breastplate.description: A rare artifact. This magnificent breastplate is so ornate, it was likely used for ceremonial purposes.

caldosian-drinking-horn.name: Caldosian Drinking Horn
caldosian-drinking-horn.description: A rare artifact. Drinking horns were usually passed down through the family line.

caldosian-emperor-bust.name: Caldosian Emperor Bust
caldosian-emperor-bust.description: An uncommon artifact. The bust of a Caldosian Emperor. It's not clear which one.

caldosian-sword.name: Caldosian Sword
caldosian-sword.description: An uncommon artifact. An imperial officer's sword from the early days of the Caldosian Empire.

statuette-of-caldarus.name: Statuette of Caldarus
statuette-of-caldarus.description: A legendary artifact. There seems to have been a subset of the empire that once worshiped Caldarus...

alda-bronze-sword.name: Alda Bronze Sword
alda-bronze-sword.description: A rare artifact. Its intricate carvings and blue-green patina give this sword an otherworldly appearance.

alda-clay-pot.name: Alda Clay Pot
alda-clay-pot.description: An uncommon artifact. Made from rich river clay, a faded pattern can still be seen. Once used by the Alda people to store food.

alda-feather-pendant.name: Alda Feather Pendant
alda-feather-pendant.description: An uncommon artifact. Once used in marriage proposals, beautifully designed.

alda-gem-bracelet.name: Alda Gem Bracelet
alda-gem-bracelet.description: A legendary artifact. Non-local gems suggest the Alda had trading partners across the sea.

alda-mural-tablet.name: Alda Mural Tablet
alda-mural-tablet.description: A rare artifact. Depicts a scene of the Mistrian coast, as seen hundreds of years ago.

ancient-crystal-goblet.name: Ancient Crystal Goblet
ancient-crystal-goblet.description: A rare artifact. Elegant and sturdy, this goblet was likely used during Witch Queen rituals.

ancient-gold-coin.name: Ancient Gold Coin
ancient-gold-coin.description: An uncommon artifact. Etched with the outline of the Witch Queen on one side, and a magnificent tower on the other.

ancient-horn-circlet.name: Ancient Horn Circlet
ancient-horn-circlet.description: A rare artifact. A horn circlet from the age of the Witch Queens. Was this a fashion accessory or did it serve a greater purpose?

ancient-royal-scepter.name: Ancient Royal Scepter
ancient-royal-scepter.description: A legendary artifact. A Royal Scepter with the head of a dragon. The symbol of the Witch Queen's authority.

ancient-stone-lantern.name: Ancient Stone Lantern
ancient-stone-lantern.description: An uncommon artifact. An impossibly delicate stone lantern from the age of the Witch Queens. It still retains an ethereal glow from within.

amber-trapped-insect.name: Amber Trapped Insect
amber-trapped-insect.description: An uncommon artifact. It's noticeably bigger than today's insects.

fossilized-egg.name: Fossilized Egg
fossilized-egg.description: A rare artifact. What could be inside?

meteorite.name: Meteorite
meteorite.description: A legendary artifact. There's no telling how long ago it fell...

tiny-dinosaur-skeleton.name: Tiny Dinosaur Skeleton
tiny-dinosaur-skeleton.description: A rare artifact. Definitely not just a lizard.

trilobite-fossil.name: Trilobite Fossil
trilobite-fossil.description: An uncommon artifact. Too many legs, but still kinda cute.

black-tablet.name: Black Tablet
black-tablet.description: An uncommon artifact. Made of a strange metal, it's not clear what this is for.

completely-wrong-map.name: Completely Wrong Map
completely-wrong-map.description: An uncommon artifact. A badly faded map that appears to show a landmass where the Western Bay now lies.

muttering-cube.name: Muttering Cube
muttering-cube.description: An uncommon artifact. This device emits a low hiss most of the time, and occasionally what sounds like voices from far away.

unknown-dragon-statuette.name: Unknown Dragon Statuette
unknown-dragon-statuette.description: An uncommon artifact. This doesn't appear to be Caldarus.

weightless-stone.name: Weightless Stone
weightless-stone.description: An uncommon artifact. This black stone appears otherworldly in origin. It has no weight, and will roll around from the slightest breeze.

coin-lamp.name: Coin Lamp
coin-lamp.description: An uncommon artifact. A mass of old coins, fused together by time.

giant-fish-scale.name: Giant Fish Scale
giant-fish-scale.description: An uncommon artifact. Can't imagine what fish this came from.

rubber-fish.name: Rubber Fish
rubber-fish.description: An uncommon artifact. How did this get in the water in the first place?

rusted-treasure-chest.name: Rusted Treasure Chest
rusted-treasure-chest.description: An uncommon artifact. Looks quite valuable, a shame it can't be opened.

water-sphere.name: Water Sphere
water-sphere.description: An uncommon artifact. You're not sure why, but it won't pop.

criminal-confession.name: Criminal Confession
criminal-confession.description: An uncommon artifact. Too bad the pages are fused together.

mermaids-comb.name: Mermaid's Comb
mermaids-comb.description: An uncommon artifact. Looks suspiciously like a fork.

rainbow-seaweed.name: Rainbow Seaweed
rainbow-seaweed.description: An uncommon artifact. Can only be found floating in the current, no one seems to know where it grows.

rock-with-a-hole.name: Rock with a Hole
rock-with-a-hole.description: An uncommon artifact. Seems to be naturally formed.

rusted-shield.name: Rusted Shield
rusted-shield.description: An uncommon artifact. A very old shield with an unusual design.
